| **[Weight](/wiki/Weight "Weight")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | 900                                   |
| **[Nutritional value](/wiki/Nutrition "Nutrition")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | 400                                   |
| **[Size](/wiki/Physical_size "Physical size")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | large                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                                       |
| **[Resistances](/wiki/Resistance "Resistance")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | [sleep](/wiki/Sleep "Sleep")          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                                       |
| A dream quasielemental:* can [fly](/wiki/Fly "Fly").
* is an [animal](/wiki/Animal "Animal").
* can [see invisible creatures](/wiki/See_invisible "See invisible").
* [does not eat](/wiki/Inediate "Inediate"). (\*)
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* wanders randomly.
* can [follow](/wiki/Follower "Follower") you to other levels.
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* has [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* [never leaves a corpse](/wiki/Corpseless "Corpseless"). |                                       |

**Dream quasielementals** are [shapeshifters](/wiki/Shapeshifter "Shapeshifter") in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"). They polymorph just like chameleons, but with a 1/3 chance of turning into their base form instead each polymorph, so they'll often be encountered as their true selves. In their base forms, they also hate iron, which can make them easier to dispatch.

Orange half-dragon bards can sing dream quasielementals into being.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Dream_quasielemental\&action=edit)*
html:
Dream quasielemental

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
E dream quasielemental (No tile)
Difficulty 10
Attacks Claw 4d4 sleep
E dream quasielemental (No tile)
Difficulty 10
Attacks

Claw 4d4 sleep

Base level 8
Base experience 121
Speed 12
Base AC 3
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable No
Weight 900
Nutritional value 400
Size large
Resistances sleep

A dream quasielemental:

  • can fly.
  • is an animal.
  • can see invisible creatures.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • wanders randomly.
  • can follow you to other levels.
  • is strong.
  • has infravision.
  • never leaves a corpse.

Dream quasielementals are shapeshifters in dNetHack. They polymorph just like chameleons, but with a 1/3 chance of turning into their base form instead each polymorph, so they'll often be encountered as their true selves. In their base forms, they also hate iron, which can make them easier to dispatch.

Orange half-dragon bards can sing dream quasielementals into being.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Dream_quasielemental&oldid=129246"

'''Dream quasielementals''' are [[shapeshifter]]s in [[dNetHack]]. They polymorph just like chameleons, but with a 1/3 chance of turning into their base form instead each polymorph, so they'll often be encountered as their true selves. In their base forms, they also hate iron, which can make them easier to dispatch.

Orange half-dragon bards can sing dream quasielementals into being.
